modName: Requiem - Unique and Radiant Potions Poison and Booze patch
summary: This patch simply forwards changes by Requiem and Unique and Radiant Potions Poison and Booze No Glow.
descriptionHtml:
This is a small patch for Requiem by Xarrian and Ogerboss and Unique and Radiant Potions Poison and Booze No Glow by XRC.
It is designed with Requiem 1.7.3 and Unique and Radiant Potions Poison and Booze v2 No Glow in mind. A version that supports the potion weight changes of Requiem - Hard Times 1.65 by Azirok is also provided. Please check TES5Edit and see if a version update is necessary before contacting me about updates, thank you!
I might not be around the comments too often, if you have a question regarding versions please contact me via PM.

Enjoy!
author: Spock

files.name: Requiem Radiant and Unique Potions Poisons and Booze Patch
files.fileName: Requiem Radiant and Unique Potions Poisons and Booze Patch-52209-1-0.7z
files.changelogHtml: Reuploaded the pack because of some embarrassing typos in the readme (there are probably more). Version number has not changed, it's still the same .esp
